title: 664: BITCOIN BEST CASE SCENARIO IS $450K BY CHRISTMAS, ACCORDING TO THIS BTC PRICE PREDICTION MODEL!!!!!
description:
Quantitative analyst PlanB says he believes that his end-of-year Bitcoin price forecast will be realized. According to PlanB, BTC will hit a 6-figure price by the end of 2021.

“I never had any doubt. I still think it will be $100K EOY, minimum. 

"Wait until you [see] my base case and best case scenarios! OK, a hint: best case Dec $450K."

For complete show notes and for the full premium experience with video, visit our YT channel at http://CryptoNewsAlerts.net
